DOC.brief_summary: This second-year part two-phase prospective epidemiological study well community case-controled study . The aim second year study firstly , investigate clinical course 1-year outcome eat disorder community , well prospective risk factor eat disorder ; secondly , case-control design involve psychiatric disorder study population use risk factor study . The study subject gift dance high school student participate first-year study willing participate 2nd-year study ( N=675 ) . Screening questionnaire eat disorder general psychiatric disorder EAT , BITE CHQ-12 . Other self-report questionnaire include perfectionism subscale Eating Disorder Inventor-I ( EDI ) , Rosenberg Self-esteem Scale ( RSE ) , Eyseck Personality Scale , Pubertal Develoment Scale , body figure test . Subjects receive interview first-year study whose score threshold screen questionnaire need receive interview 2nd phase . The criterion interview threshold include EAT≧20+ BMI < 18.5Kg/m2 , symptom scale BITE ≧15 and/or severity scale BITE≧5 , CHQ ≧4 . The content interview include structured diagnostic interview ( SCID-IP 1995 ) well risk factor assessment . Each time subject bulimia nervosa recruit , one match control subject mental illness general psychiatric diagnosis seek class school . Potential psychiatric control subject identify score CHQ . The psychiatric control subject require current past eating disorder . The content risk factor assessment include personal vulnerability family problem . The relationship individual risk factor case status assess univariate analysis . Conditional logistic analysis use multivariate analysis risk factor prediction eat disorder . To assess relative importance different type exposure , relationship case status exposure domain first assess univariate analysis multivariate stepwise regression analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Epidemiological Studies Eating Disorders Gifted Dance Students ( 2nd Year ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This second-year part two-phase prospective epidemiological study well community case-controled study . The aim second year study firstly , investigate clinical course 1-year outcome eat disorder community , well prospective risk factor eat disorder ; secondly , case-control design involve psychiatric disorder study population use risk factor study . The study subject Taiwanese gift dance high school students.Parental inform consent nonpartipation deliver 3 day study start . Screening questionnaire eat disorder general psychiatric disorder include EAT ( Eating Attitude Test ) , BITE ( Bulimic Investigatory Test , Ediburgh BITE ) CHQ-12 ( Chinese Health Questionnaire ) . Other self-report questionnaire include perfectionism subscale Eating Disorder Inventor-I ( EDI ) , Rosenberg Self-esteem Scale ( RSE ) , Eyseck Personality Inventory , Pubertal Develoment Scale , body figure test . Subjects receive interview first-year study whose score threshold screen questionnaire need receive interview 2nd phase . The criterion interview threshold include EAT≧20+ BMI < 18.5Kg/m2 , symptom scale BITE ≧15 and/or severity scale BITE≧5 , CHQ ≧4 . The content interview include structured diagnostic interview ( SCID-IP 1995 ) well risk factor assessment . Each time subject bulimia nervosa recruit , one match control subject mental illness general psychiatric diagnosis seek class school . Potential psychiatric control subject identify score CHQ . The psychiatric control subject require current past eating disorder . The content risk factor assessment include personal vulnerability family problem . The relationship individual risk factor case status assess univariate analysis . Conditional logistic analysis use multivariate analysis risk factor prediction eat disorder . To assess relative importance different type exposure , relationship case status exposure domain first assess univariate analysis multivariate stepwise regression analysis .
